name: Purp & Pink
description: This is the first thing I've ever coded. This is just a passion project and I posting it here and see how it goes. The game has only 14 levels (as of writing this) so it should be quite easy to complete and I suggest that you look at the "HELP?" menu first to understand all of the controls. Let me know if you want me to improve this game and make some other games that I have ideas for. Also here's a hint for level 14, you are meant to abuse the game mechanics.
